Question & Options:
In the movie 'Yaadein' (2001), which of the following statements are true regarding the casting of the lead roles?
Options:
A. A. Hrithik Roshan played the male lead in 'Yaadein'.
B. B. Kareena Kapoor was the first choice for the female lead.
C. C. Ameesha Patel was initially approached for the female lead.
D. D. Kareena Kapoor and Hrithik Roshan collaborated multiple times after 'Yaadein'.

Which of the following statements are true regarding the movie 'Yaadein' released in 2001?
Options:
A. A. Hrithik Roshan starred in 'Yaadein'.
B. B. 'Yaadein' was a box office success.
C. C. Kareena Kapoor appeared opposite Hrithik Roshan in 'Yaadein'.
D. D. 'Yaadein' was a box office failure.

In the movie 'Yaadein' released in 2001, which of the following statements are true regarding the casting of the female lead?
Options:
A. Ameesha Patel was initially approached for the role.
B. Hrithik Roshan was the only lead actor in the film.
C. Ameesha Patel was unable to take on the role due to availability issues.
D. The female lead was replaced by another actress.
Correct Answer: Ameesha Patel was initially approached for the role., Ameesha Patel was unable to take on the role due to availability issues.

Question & Options:
In the movie 'Yaadein' (2001), which of the following statements are true regarding the leading ladies?
Options:
A. A. Kareena Kapoor was signed as the leading lady opposite Hrithik Roshan.
B. B. Ameesha Patel played the role of the main female lead in 'Yaadein'.
C. C. Kareena Kapoor and Ameesha Patel both starred in 'Yaadein' as leading ladies.
D. D. Kareena Kapoor was chosen over Ameesha Patel for the leading role.
